channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s time to reimagine farming as an innovative career path
item.description: American agriculture is facing a crisis. The average U.S. farmer is nearly 60, and according to American Farmland Trust research , we are losing farml...

item.title: CoreWeave’s earnings report highlights $56 billion in contracted revenue, but its guidance and share price tick down amid AI infrastructure bubble fears
item.description: All eyes were on the datacenter operator’s RPO figure, which matched Wall Street’s $50 billion-$60 billion expectations.

item.title: Surprise Provision in Senate Shutdown Deal Could Destroy This $28 Billion Beverage Industry
item.description: It supports 300,000 jobs and contributes $1.5 billion in taxes.

item.title: CoreWeave Doubled Revenue, But Here’s Why It’s Lowering Its Outlook for the Year
item.description: While the AI-focused data center operator exceeded Wall Street’s expectations, a delay will dent earnings, the company warned.

item.title: Airport lounges are about to get even more exclusive as some credit card companies jack up annual fees by more than 40%
item.description: One of the most popular travel perk cards, the Chase Sapphire Reserve, just ratcheted up its annual fee from $550 to $795.

item.title: Senate nears vote on government shutdown deal
item.description: The Senate was drawing closer to a vote on legislation to end the shutdown on Monday after a small group of Senate Democrats broke a 40-day stalemate ...

item.title: FDA removes warning label from hormone-based menopause drugs, sidestepping usual process
item.description: Hormone-based drugs used to treat hot flashes and other menopause symptoms will no longer carry a bold warning label about stroke, heart attack, demen...

item.title: Trump demands $10,000 bonuses for air traffic controllers who worked during shutdown and pay cuts for those who didn’t amid flight chaos
item.description: Air travelers should expect worsening cancellations and delays this week even if the government shutdown ends.

item.title: Palantir CEO Says This 1 Type of Elite College Grad Is ‘Effed’
You don’t hate AI because of genuine dislike. No, there’s a $1 billion plot by the ‘Doomer Industrial Complex’ to brainwash you, Trump’s AI czar says
item.description: Remember “Effective Altruism?” The movement led by disgraced crypto kingpin Sam Bankman-Fried is back, lobbying against AI.

item.title: If Your Content Needs Explaining, It’s Not Good Enough
item.description: Clever is fun, but it doesn’t sell.

item.title: How to Develop a Culture Without Borders
item.description: International teams can function well with the right tools and infrastructure.

item.title: Warren Buffett warns ‘Father Time’ is catching up and reflects on his life in a letter to shareholders
item.description: Billionaire Warren Buffett warned shareholders Monday that many companies will fare better than his Berkshire Hathaway in the decades ahead because of...

item.title: Here’s how American Airlines plans to bounce back after the shutdown chaos
item.description: When the head of schedule planning at American Airlines, Jay Gargas, stepped off the plane in Dallas-Fort Worth after an 18-hour journey from Istanbul...

item.title: Trump’s $2,000 tariff ‘dividends’ would cost twice as much as the revenue coming in, budget watchdog warns
item.description: “If tariff dividends are paid annually, deficits would increase by $6 trillion over ten years,” per the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget.
